title: Add an option to easily toggle certain abilities between Quick Cast and Quick Cast With Indicator
body:
I would love the option to easily toggle certain abilities between "Quick Cast" and "Quick Cast with Indicator" as easily as you can toggle between "Quick Cast" and "Normal Cast" by using the arrow under all the hotkey squares.

There would be many games where I would toggle certain abilities between "Quick Cast" and "Quick Cast with Indicator" for different champions.

For example, with {{champion:412}} I would want to have his Q and E on  "Quick Cast with Indicator" but I would want his W to be on "Quick Cast" as pictured in the link. 

But Thresh is just one example for the 100+ champs in League. Others I would use this for would be,

{{champion:13}}
Q - Quick Cast with Indicator
W - Quick Cast
E - Quick Cast
R - Quick Cast
______________________
{{champion:9}} and {{champion:1}} 
Q - Quick Cast
W - Quick Cast
E - Quick Cast
R - Quick Cast with Indicator
_______________________
{{champion:161}} 
Q - Quick Cast with Indicator
W - Quick Cast with Indicator
E - Quick Cast
R - Quick Cast
_______________________

And many, many others. These are just what my personal Hotkeys would be but I'm sure many others would like to have this option because everyone have their own personal Hotkeys in mind. Even though most people probably just use Quick Cast. :P

EDIT: I imagine this can be done by adding this option. http://puu.sh/oQb3K/c630e6acf4.png.
While also changing the visuals of the quickbind UI to show that Normal Cast has been switched to Quick Cast with Indicator.

replies.body:
Mate even if these features aren't added (They will be) ... you have a career in using mspaint. Well done!

Riot should gift you 10K RP when they implement your idea.

Oh man this would be awesome! I get really confused when I load up into a game playing Urgot and suddenly my q doesn't have any indicator and just goes off, it kinda confuses me and would be great to be able to switch them up when I need. nice idea
no real reason not to, HotS has this feature atm, changes the game quite a bit imo
